identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Hospitality, Restaurant and Travel

abstract.p: Doral Park Avenue Hotel in New York City, in partnership with Golf Club at Chelsea Piers, is offering golf packages (S)

block.p: Plenty of hotels offer golf packages, but how many of them are in Manhattan? The Doral Park Avenue's golf package doesn't require clandestine drives in Central Park, thanks to a partnership with the Golf Club at Chelsea Piers. The hotel's plan, starting at $345 a night Sunday to Thursday and $305 weekends, includes accommodations, a one-hour private lesson with a PGA instructor, video swing analysis, reservations at a driving stall and up to 125 balls at the range. The hotel is at Park Avenue and 38th Street; Chelsea Piers is on the Hudson at 23rd Street. Information and reservations: (877) 993-6725.

The hotel's plan, starting at $345 a night Sunday to Thursday and $305 weekends, includes accommodations, a one-hour private lesson with a PGA instructor, video swing analysis, reservations at a driving stall and up to 125 balls at the range. The hotel is at Park Avenue and 38th Street; Chelsea Piers is on the Hudson at 23rd Street. Information and reservations: (877) 993-6725.

Adventures in Rock allows rock fans to be roadies without any of the hard work. The tour company, based in Brookline, Mass., organizes trips to rock concerts around the world. Upcoming trips include two to London: Nov. 2 to 6 to see Smashing Pumpkins at Wembley Arena, Nov. 10 to 14 for the Who Reunion Tour in London Arena. Each trip, $990 a person, double occupancy, includes three nights in a four-star hotel in London, premium seats to the concert, a night at a music club and the services of a BBC disc jockey as tour guide; air fare is extra. Call (877) 788-7625 or www.adventuresinrock .com.
